Video Assessments
Technical assessment videos demonstrating your massage techniques

2:30
Assessment 1
Record yourself performing a deep tissue massage on the upper back and explain your technique as you go

Ensure good lighting and clear audio
Submitted
3:15
Assessment 2
Demonstrate a Swedish massage sequence on the forearm and explain the benefits

Show proper hand positioning and pressure control
Submitted
4:20
Assessment 3
Explain how you would assess a client with lower back pain before starting treatment

Include client consultation and assessment steps
Submitted
Assessment Questions Completed
Record yourself doing a deep tissue massage and explain as you go
Demonstrate proper stretching techniques for hamstrings
Show your approach to treating shoulder tension
Explain your safety protocols during massage sessions
Demonstrate communication with a client during session
Show your setup and preparation process
Explain how you adapt techniques for different body types
Demonstrate pressure control on sensitive areas
Show your post-massage aftercare advice
Explain how you handle client discomfort during session
